mapper.insert: insert into comment (targetid, userno, content, commentstatus) VALUES (#{targetid}, #{userno}, #{content}, 1)
mapper.select: select c.targetid, c.content, c.createdate, c.commentstatus, u.username, u.nickname, c.userno, u.picture from comment c join user u on c.userno = u.userno where targetid = #{param1} order by createdate
select * from liketable where targetid = #{targetid} and userno = #{userno}
